com.inherentgames

Class BBDynamicScreenObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inherentgames.BBDynamicScreenObject

  • public class BBDynamicScreenObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Tyler Class that displays on screen images or text, and moves them from their initial location to a given end point. If the object is an image, it can shrink or enlarge the image from an initial width/height, to a new width/height.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BBDynamicScreenObject(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY, java.lang.String text, long displayTime, BBWordObject.Gender article)
      Constructor for text object

      Constructor for image object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.vecmath.Point2f move()
      Moves the object towards its end point if displayTime has passed and it hasn't yet reached the end point

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BBDynamicScreenObject

        public BBDynamicScreenObject(int startX,
                     int startY,
                     int endX,
                     int endY,
                     java.lang.String text,
                     long displayTime,
                     BBWordObject.Gender article)
        Constructor for text object
        Parameters:
        startX - - the x position of where the object should start when first displayed (in pixels)
        startY - - the y position of where the object should start when first displayed (in pixels)
        endX - - the x position of where the object should end after moved (in pixels)
        endY - - the y position of where the object should end after moved (in pixels)
        text - - the string that should be displayed
        displayTime - - how long the text will be displayed until is moved to its end point
        article - - the Gender of the word, determines the color of the text

      • BBDynamicScreenObject

        public BBDynamicScreenObject(int startX,
                     int startY,
                     int endX,
                     int endY,
                     java.lang.String imageName,
                     long displayTime,
                     int initialWidth,
                     int initialHeight,
                     int endWidth,
                     int endHeight)
        Constructor for image object
        Parameters:
        startX - - the x position of where the object should start when first displayed (in pixels)
        startY - - the y position of where the object should start when first displayed (in pixels)
        endX - - the x position of where the object should end after moved (in pixels)
        endY - - the y position of where the object should end after moved (in pixels)
        imageName - - the string name of the image to be displayed
        displayTime - - how long the text will be displayed until is moved to its end point
        initialWidth - - the starting width of the image before moved (in pixels)
        initialHeight - - the starting height of the image before moved (in pixels)
        endWidth - - the ending width of the image before moved (in pixels)
        endHeight - - the ending height of the image before moved (in pixels)

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public javax.vecmath.Point2f move()
        Moves the object towards its end point if displayTime has passed and it hasn't yet reached the end point
        Returns:
        - the current location of the object
